titles.title: Tax Fairness for Americans Abroad Act of 2018
To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to provide an alternative exclusion for nonresident citizens of the United States living abroad.
Tax Fairness for Americans Abroad Act of 2018

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary:
Tax Fairness for Americans Abroad Act of 2018
This bill allows certain U.S. citizens who are residents of foreign countries to elect to use an alternative tax exclusion for foreign source earned and unearned income.
